```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset
```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data.
```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in 'litters_df'.
```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df
```

Skimming data...
```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

# Fix missingness
```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA",".",""), skip = 5)
```

Importing Pups
```{r}
pups_df = 
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv", 
           skip = 3,
           na = c("NA",".","")
           )

pups_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
